channel.title: Terraria is comming soon!
channel.description:
[size=24pt]terraria [/size] its comming out at 16th may 2011!
Whats it? its a game were you can build explores the deepest caves al the way down to the hell world kill mobs there ocurrently 29 and more! and dig were you want explore floading islands! and much more!
~~~~ Grab your tools and go! You can do many things in Terraria: make weapons and fight off a variety of enemies in numerous biomes, dig deep underground to find accessories, money, and other useful things, gather wood, stone, ores, and other resources to create everything you need to make the world your own and defend it. Build a house, a fort, even a castle, and people will move in to live there and perhaps even sell you different wares to assist you on your journey. But beware, there are even more challenges awaiting you... Are you up to the task? ~~~~
its a RPG game in 2d
Steam http://steamcommunity.com/groups/Terraria
official website http://www.terraria.org/

item.title: Terraria is comming soon!
item.dc:creator: @loled2 loled2
item.description:
@loled2 wrote:

CoonHunter:

Sounds like someone wanted to create a 2D/RPG version of Minecraft to me.

no total not you can watch some vids at www.youtube.com/user/paperbatVG

the game is no “rip off” minecraft i heard to many ppl sayed its but total not
and minecraft is 3d and most of building and exploring

this game is more about surviving and getting somany items as posible
and explore stuff to etc

-edit
pbat have the game already cus he is a tester of the game

Read full topic

item.title: Terraria is comming soon!
item.dc:creator: @loled2 loled2
item.description:
@loled2 wrote:

[size=24pt]terraria [/size]
its comming out at 16th may 2011!

Whats it?
its a game were you can build explores the deepest caves al the way down to the hell world
kill mobs there ocurrently 29 and more! and dig were you want explore floading islands! and much more!

Grab your tools and go! You can do many things in Terraria: make weapons and fight
off a variety of enemies in numerous biomes, dig deep underground to find
accessories, money, and other useful things, gather wood, stone, ores, and other
resources to create everything you need to make the world your own and defend it.
Build a house, a fort, even a castle, and people will move in to live there and perhaps
even sell you different wares to assist you on your journey. But beware, there are even
more challenges awaiting you... Are you up to the task?

its a RPG game in 2d

Steam

steamcommunity.com

Steam Community :: Group :: Terraria

Dig, fight, explore, build! Nothing is impossible in this action-packed adventure game. The world is your canvas and the ground itself is your paint. Grab your tools and go! You can do many things in Terraria: make weapons and fight off a variety of...

official website
http://www.terraria.org/
